do you mean these?
running install
running build_deps

WITH_CUDA=0
WITH_ROCM=0
WITH_NNPACK=0
WITH_MKLDNN=0
WITH_GLOO_IBVERBS=0
WITH_DISTRIBUTED_MW=0
[[ 8 -gt 0 ]]
case "$1" in
WITH_CUDA=1
shift
[[ 7 -gt 0 ]]
case "$1" in
WITH_NNPACK=1
shift
[[ 6 -gt 0 ]]
case "$1" in
break
CMAKE_INSTALL='make install'
USER_CFLAGS=
USER_LDFLAGS=
[[ -n '' ]]
[[ -n '' ]]
[[ -n '' ]]
++ dirname tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh
cd tools/..
+++ pwd
++ printf '%q\n' /home/shahriar/pytorch
PWD=/home/shahriar/pytorch
BASE_DIR=/home/shahriar/pytorch
TORCH_LIB_DIR=/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib
INSTALL_DIR=/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install
THIRD_PARTY_DIR=/home/shahriar/pytorch/third_party
CMAKE_VERSION=cmake
C_FLAGS=' -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN"'
C_FLAGS=' -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1'
LDFLAGS='-L"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib" '
LD_POSTFIX=.so.1
LD_POSTFIX_UNVERSIONED=.so
++ uname
[[ Linux == \D\a\r\w\i\n ]]
LDFLAGS='-L"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib"  -Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN'
CPP_FLAGS=' -std=c++11 '
GLOO_FLAGS=
THD_FLAGS=
NCCL_ROOT_DIR=/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install
[[ 1 -eq 1 ]]
GLOO_FLAGS='-DUSE_CUDA=1 -DNCCL_ROOT_DIR=/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install'
[[ 0 -eq 1 ]]
[[ 0 -eq 1 ]]
CWRAP_FILES='/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/Declarations.cwrap;/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/THNN/generic/THNN.h;/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/THCUNN.h;/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/ATen/nn.yaml'
CUDA_NVCC_FLAGS=' -DTH_INDEX_BASE=0 -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include"   -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/TH" -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THC"   -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THS" -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCS"   -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN" -I"/home/shahriar/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THCUNN" -DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX=1'
[[ '' -eq 1 ]]
'[' -z 8 ']'
BUILD_TYPE=Release
[[ -n '' ]]
[[ -n '' ]]
echo 'Building in Release mode'
Building in Release mode
mkdir -p torch/lib/tmp_install
for arg in "$@"
[[ nccl == \n\c\c\l ]]
pushd /home/shahriar/pytorch/third_party
/home/shahriar/pytorch/third_party /home/shahriar/pytorch
build_nccl
mkdir -p build/nccl
pushd build/nccl
/home/shahriar/pytorch/third_party/build/nccl /home/shahriar/pytorch/third_party /home/shahriar/pytorch
